LanguageData.OCC_PowerFist_EMP.label: Typhon(EMP)
LanguageData.OCC_PowerFist_EMP.description:
Regular Power Fist used by the OCC Knights.

It's remanufactured weapon using OTC technologies. Charged with EMP damage.

Warning! EMP damage isn't intended to destroy meatbags.
